Name: intraductal papilloma
Definition: An intraductal papillary breast neoplasm that is has_material_basis_in epithelial tissue on papillae of vascularized connective tissue.

Name: intraductal papillary breast neoplasm
Definition: An intraductal breast neoplasm that is characterized by fingerlike growth projections.

Name: breast intraductal proliferative lesion
Definition: An intraductal breast neoplasm that is characterized by an increase in the number of cells perpendicular to the basement membrane resulting in total alteration and distension of the normal unit structure of the breast. It is confined to the duct-lobular system

Name: localized intraductal papillomatosis
Definition: A breast papillomatosis that is located within the ducts.
